column5: Caught decent bass & little pike all day in a variety of spots, deep and shallow. Shallow produced the biggest. Got 5th place in the Lakeshore Shopper derby with the fish on the left which weighed at 3.84lbs.    These two were caught back to back on a black buzzbait. Don't let the rough water throw off your topwater bite!  Gotta love bass season.  An hour and a half of swimbaiting the other evening on a nearby pond produced this hefty fish too.    Looking forward to stinging some more big jaws!
Nice shots!!! I was hoping for some shallow water Largies today, but the smallies came out to play. Gotta love bucket mouths. Cheers
Good stuff, Rich!  Congrats on the fifth place finish!
